pr_title: fix: Use ArrayList while creating ListDataProvider from items array

timeline.message: fix: Use java.util.ArrayList while creating ListDataProvider from items array

timeline.bodyText: Could you please also check the components whether they use the immutable collections to set the items to data provider. At least I could find this case in combo box: https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-flow-components/blob/ecc6d468f11ba7dc33d4ae4cab86bdbeee2b3766/vaadin-combo-box-flow-parent/vaadin-combo-box-flow/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/component/combobox/ComboBox.java#L506
